includedAssets.title: Kettle-Kettle-Black-Black
includedAssets.synopsis: Jackie (Edie Falco) and Kevin deal with the aftermath of his shocking revelation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jackie (Edie Falco) and Kevin deal with the aftermath of his shocking revelation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jackie (Edie Falco) and Kevin deal with the aftermath of his shocking revelation.

includedAssets.title: Disneyland Sucks
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jackie tries to get to grips with rehab, Cruz makes changes at All Saints, and Akalitus adjusts to life on the hospital floor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jackie tries to get to grips with rehab, Cruz makes changes at All Saints, and Akalitus adjusts to life on the hospital floor.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jackie tries to get to grips with rehab, Cruz makes changes at All Saints, and Akalitus adjusts to life on the hospital floor.

includedAssets.title: The Wall
includedAssets.synopsis: Jackie checks out of rehab early, but finds working sober for the first time even more challenging than she expected. The acclaimed comedy drama continues.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jackie checks out of rehab early, but finds working sober for the first time even more challenging than she expected.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jackie checks out of rehab early, but finds working sober for the first time even more challenging than she expected. The acclaimed comedy drama continues.

includedAssets.title: Slow Growing Monsters
includedAssets.synopsis: After the truth about Jackie's stay in rehab comes out, she decides to come clean with Kevin. Meanwhile, a live-wire patient makes her mark on the ER.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After the truth about Jackie's stay in rehab comes out, she decides to come clean with Kevin. Plus, a live-wire patient makes her mark on the ER.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After the truth about Jackie's stay in rehab comes out, she decides to come clean with Kevin. Meanwhile, a live-wire patient makes her mark on the ER.

includedAssets.title: One-Armed Jacks
includedAssets.synopsis: Jackie attempts to reconnect with Kevin, unaware he has a nasty surprise in store. Meanwhile, Zoe is on the hunt for a new flatmate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jackie attempts to reconnect with Kevin, unaware he has a nasty surprise in store. Meanwhile, Zoe is on the hunt for a new flatmate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jackie attempts to reconnect with Kevin, unaware he has a nasty surprise in store. Meanwhile, Zoe is on the hunt for a new flatmate.

includedAssets.title: No-Kimono-Zone
includedAssets.synopsis: Zoe gets engaged to Lenny, but the happy-go-lucky nurse starts to have doubts when she loses her ring. Meanwhile, Kevin sues Jackie for custody of the kids.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Zoe gets engaged to Lenny, but the happy-go-lucky nurse starts to have doubts when she loses her ring. Meanwhile, Kevin sues Jackie for custody.

includedAssets.title: Day Of The Iguana
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep7 - Day Of The Iguana
includedAssets.synopsis: Jackie's new divorce lawyer gears her up for battle, while the staff humour an ex-employee (Cabaret's Joel Grey) who has dementia.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jackie's new divorce lawyer gears her up for battle, while the staff humour an ex-employee (Cabaret's Joel Grey) who has dementia.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jackie's new divorce lawyer gears her up for battle, while the staff humour an ex-employee (Cabaret's Joel Grey) who has dementia.

includedAssets.title: Chaud & Fraud
includedAssets.synopsis: After learning about Jackie's friendship with Charlie, Mike gets even by punishing some of her closest allies. Meanwhile, O'Hara lets her guard down.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After learning about Jackie's friendship with Charlie, Mike gets even by punishing some of her closest allies. Meanwhile, O'Hara lets her guard down.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After learning about Jackie's friendship with Charlie, Mike gets even by punishing some of her closest allies. Meanwhile, O'Hara lets her guard down.

includedAssets.title: Are Those Feathers?
includedAssets.synopsis: With Cruz still on the warpath, recent dismissals stretch the staff to breaking point. Plus, an emotional O'Hara breaks down over her pregnancy woes.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Cruz still on the warpath, recent dismissals stretch the staff to breaking point. Plus, an emotional O'Hara breaks down over her pregnancy woes.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Cruz still on the warpath, recent dismissals stretch the staff to breaking point. Plus, an emotional O'Hara breaks down over her pregnancy woes.

includedAssets.title: Handle Your Scandal
includedAssets.synopsis: In the explosive season finale, Cruz and Jackie have a very public bust-up that could have lasting consequences. Meanwhile, O'Hara goes into labour.

includedAssets.synopsis: Jackie finally checks into rehab, while the arrival of Dr Mike Cruz (Bobby Cannavale) shakes up All Saints. Fourth season starring Edie Falco.

includedIn.title: Nurse Jackie
includedIn.synopsis: A troubled ER nurse with an addiction to painkillers continuously finds ways to put her marriage, friendships and career in jeopardy.
